official_title: A joint resolution designating the week of May 24 to May 30, 1987, as "Fight Leukemia Week".

summary.text: Designates the week of May 24 to May 30, 1987, as Fight Leukemia Week. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to support research being performed to eradicate leukemia and its related diseases.

titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of May 24 to May 30, 1987, as "Fight Leukemia Week".
